## hpr2491 :: Some news with Finux

 The 3 stories covered in this episode

So firstly Clownflares... i mean cloudstrike!!! and scihub
https://torrentfreak.com/cloudflare-terminates-service-to-sci-hub-domain-names-180205/
Meltdown and Spectre 139 pieces of (seemingly nonfunctional) malware are now circulating in the wild
https://boingboing.net/2018/02/04/active-probing.html
Equifax and no bloody justice
https://mobile.reuters.com/article/amp/idUSKBN1FP0IZ
